translation.en: [man] So I put my finger here, and check this...
translation.zh:
‎-我就把手指放在这里 你看
‎-嗯

translation.en: the watch tells me I have a heart problem.
Wouldn't a mirror tell you the same thing?
Yeah, but this has weather, too.
translation.zh: ‎能是能 不过这里还有天气显示

translation.en: Okay.
We got an hour until we're meeting the ladies for dinner.
translation.zh:
‎我们和女士们约好的晚餐时间
‎还有一小时呢

translation.en: -Yeah. -You wanna catch a beer?
I can't. I gotta run a few errands.
What? You don't want a beer? What's wrong?
translation.zh: ‎怎么？你不想去喝啤酒？你怎么了？

translation.en: [sighs] I... got the results back from the detective exam.
You failed again? This is why I never took that test.
translation.zh: ‎你又没过？所以我从不去考那个

translation.en: All the anxiety and disappointment.
At some point, you have to realize you have hit your ceiling
translation.zh:
‎有些时候 你必须要清楚
‎你已经到极限了

translation.en: and just give up.
You know, you should go around and speak at schools.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗 你应该去学校演讲去

translation.en: -That was very inspiring. -I should. Kids need to hear this shit.
translation.zh:
‎-你很会启发人
‎-我是该去 应该让孩子们都听听

translation.en: I don't get it, man.
I know all the answers, I just freeze under pressure.
translation.zh:
‎答案我都知道
‎ 可一紧张就发挥不出来

translation.en: You know, I can't take the exam for, like, three more months,
translation.zh: ‎差不多三个月内 我都不能再考了

translation.en: so I gotta continue lying to Audrey.
So when we're at dinner tonight, please,
-tell your wi-- -Ah! No.
Come on, man. You know I'll lie for you anytime.
translation.zh:
‎别这样 哥们儿 你知道
‎为了你 我谎话连篇都行

translation.en: I will cover up dead bodies for you.
But if I ask Holly to lie to your wife, there's no way we're messing around.
translation.zh:
‎但要我让霍莉骗你老婆
‎是不可能蒙混过关的 ‎《疯狂星期五》里才有的事

translation.en: It's Freaky Friday!
You don't have to lie, just tell her to ignore when I'm lying.
translation.zh:
‎不用你骗谁
‎你就让她在我撒谎的时候别多话

translation.en: That's it.
-Okay, fine. -Thank you.
-You owe me. -[phone buzzing]
See you tonight.
I gotta get Claritin. Claritin.
translation.zh: ‎要买氯雷他定 氯雷他定

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God! Look!
[woman 1] He took her in a helicopter?
translation.zh:
‎-哦 天哪
‎-他带她坐的直升飞机？

translation.en: My husband won't even pay for Uber Black.
translation.zh: ‎我丈夫连优步轿车都舍不得带我坐

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. I don't even-- I can't even remember the last time
that Nick did anything even remotely romantic.
translation.zh: ‎对 我甚至都记不起 ‎尼克上次什么时候稍微有点浪漫了

translation.en: I mean, he used to leave me, like, cute little mixtapes,
translation.zh:
‎他以前还会
‎给我留那种很可爱的小混合磁带

translation.en: little love notes in the bathroom.
Love notes are dead.
When my husband wants to have sex, he just texts me the eggplant and doughnut emoji.
translation.zh:
‎我丈夫想要爱爱的时候
‎会给我发茄子和甜甜圈的表情符

translation.en: Eggplant and doughnut--
Oh. He's the eggplant.
More like a fingerling potato.
[woman 2] It doesn't take that much.
There are guys at the intersection selling flowers.
You just roll down the window, grab a bunch, bring 'em home.
translation.zh:
‎只要摇下车窗
‎伸手买一束拿回家就行了

translation.en: -I mean, they couldn't make it any easier. -[woman 2] No kidding.
translation.zh: ‎我说真的 他们就不想让你好过 ‎没错

translation.en: I mean, tomorrow is our 15th wedding anniversary.
translation.zh: ‎明天是我们的十五周年结婚纪念日

translation.en: I'm still waiting on that trip to Europe he promised me on our wedding day.
translation.zh:
‎我却还在等他实现婚礼那天
‎许下要带我去欧洲旅游的承诺

translation.en: -[woman 1] That's been 15 years? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎（很快！爱你的尼克） ‎-已经十五年了？
‎-是啊

translation.en: -I could have walked to Europe by now. -[laughs]
You know, you just have to tell him.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗 你应该提醒他一下

translation.en: I just don't want to have to tell him. I just want him to know.
translation.zh: ‎我不想提醒他 我想让他自己记得

translation.en: -No, they never just know. -I know.
translation.zh:
‎-不 他们永远都记不起来的
‎-我知道

translation.en: -That doesn't happen. -You have to tell men everything.
translation.zh:
‎-不可能的
‎-他什么事都要你说

translation.en: If you want the dishes to not go in the sink, you have to tell them.
translation.zh: ‎你必须告诉他 碟子碗都放到水槽里

translation.en: If you want him to shower before he comes to bed,
-you have to ask him. -Ugh.
That's why they have those signs in bathrooms at restaurants
translation.zh: ‎这就是为什么在餐馆的卫生间里

translation.en: to tell employees to wash their hands.
translation.zh: ‎会贴着让员工洗手的标志了

translation.en: Those aren't for women, guys. Those are for men.
translation.zh:
‎那些标志不是给女人看的
‎是提醒男人的

translation.en: Or maybe you could just text him, airplane, wine glass,
translation.zh:
‎也许你可以用表情符给他发条信息
‎ 飞机、酒杯

translation.en: Italian flag, eggplant, doughnut, doughnut, doughnut.
translation.zh:
‎意大利国旗、茄子、
‎甜甜圈、甜甜圈、甜甜圈

translation.en: Let's go with the 50.
Claritin...
[cashier] Hi, welcome.
Thank you.
-[woman] Thanks a lot. -[register beeping]
Are you gonna tell 'em about the stuff in your backpack?
translation.zh: ‎你会告诉他们你背包里的东西吧？

translation.en: Mind your own business, man. I'm paying for this.
translation.zh: ‎管好你自己的事吧 我又不是不付钱

translation.en: I like your sneakers. They must be expensive.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢你的运动鞋 一定很贵吧

translation.en: Is that why can't afford the Monster Energy Drink
translation.zh: ‎所以才买不起怪兽高能饮料

translation.en: or the Flamin' Hot Cheetos?
-Hang on. Hang on. -Hey, let go of me, man.
translation.zh:
‎-等等
‎-嘿 别烦我 老哥

translation.en: I can't believe I was right.
Keep your mouth shut. I'll mess you up, old man.
translation.zh: ‎你闭嘴 否则我会让你好看 老头子

translation.en: Old man. Oh, my God.
First of all,
I should throw you in jail just for calling me "old man,"
translation.zh:
‎就你这一句老头子
‎也够我送你去蹲大牢

translation.en: but you bring that stuff back,
translation.zh: ‎不过要是你把东西都放回去

translation.en: I'll let you go 'cause I'm late for dinner and I'm hungry as shit.
translation.zh:
‎我就饶过你
‎因为我晚餐迟到了 饿得要死

translation.en: Go ahead.
-[man 1] Tylenol PM? Am I right? -[man 2] No.
translation.zh:
‎泰诺安？对吧？ ‎-不 她不用那个
‎-它有副作用

translation.en: [woman 1] It's not good for that. It depends on what time of year you go.
translation.zh:
‎-不 她不用那个
‎-它有副作用 ‎-但要看你在一年的什么时候去
‎-谢谢

translation.en: [woman 2] That makes sense. Can I get another? We're gonna have another one?
translation.zh:
‎-我再来一杯可以吗？
‎-还要再来一杯？

translation.en: I'm just saying, we're paying today. Maybe you can take it easy a little bit.
translation.zh:
‎我是说 今天我们请客
‎你不用那么小心

translation.en: Hey, hey. Nick. Nick. What-- What's wrong with you?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 尼克 你怎么回事？
‎-对不起

translation.en: Sorry. Should I not order another drink, Detective?
translation.zh: ‎我不能再喝一杯了 警探？

translation.en: No. Holly, order another drink.
translation.zh:
‎-不 霍莉 再点一杯吧
‎-你想点几杯就点几杯

translation.en: [chuckles] Order as much as you want. I was joking around.
translation.zh:
‎-不 霍莉 再点一杯吧
‎-你想点几杯就点几杯 ‎-我是开玩笑的
‎-一点都不好笑

translation.en: -That's not funny. -The reason--
translation.zh:
‎-我是开玩笑的
‎-一点都不好笑

translation.en: I'm just in a great mood because I had a great day today.
translation.zh: ‎因为我心情好 今天我过得不错

translation.en: -Did we have a great day or what? -It was a fabulous day. Incredible day.
translation.zh:
‎我们今天过得不错吧？ ‎-很不错 这一天棒极了
‎-好吧

translation.en: Really? Did you get another hot case?
translation.zh:
‎-真的？又接了很刺激的案子？
‎-对

translation.en: Of what?
-"What." -[laughing] That was good. No, listen.
translation.zh: ‎“什么案子”？很有意思的 听着

translation.en: Going great, kid. I promise you.
translation.zh: ‎特别精彩 小家伙 我保证

translation.en: It's like, uh, they're trusting me more and more,
and I, um, I wish I could tell you what it was,
translation.zh: ‎我真希望我能告诉你什么案子

translation.en: but it's-- it's confidential.
-Wait a second. -What?
Oh, my God.
-What is this? -[Nick] What is that?
My baby Jimmy got it for me for my birthday.
translation.zh: ‎我宝贝儿吉米送我的生日礼物

translation.en: -Jimmy! -What?
-[Holly] Celebration diamonds. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh:
‎-庆祝钻戒
‎-我们买了 宝贝儿 ‎哦 天哪 太漂亮了

translation.en: -It's gorgeous! -Thank you, Audrey.
translation.zh:
‎哦 天哪 太漂亮了 ‎-谢谢 奥德丽
‎-很贵的

translation.en: -Very expensive. -[Audrey] Wow, Jimmy.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 奥德丽
‎-很贵的 ‎-哇哦 吉米
‎-是吧？

translation.en: I got you something special. I promise, you're gonna be very happy.
translation.zh:
‎-我也给你准备了很特别的
‎-我想也是 ‎我保证你会高兴的

translation.en: -[Holly] Really? -I can't wait.
See, I would've pegged you, Nick, as an Amazon gift card kinda guy,
translation.zh:
‎尼克 我认为你是
‎只会送亚马逊礼物卡的那种人

translation.en: but... I'm no detective.
Hey! You know what, guys?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 猜猜看 伙计们？
‎-是

translation.en: Let's toast to my friends, Nick and Audrey. Fifteen wonderful years.
translation.zh:
‎为了我们的朋友尼克和奥德丽
‎十五年美好的时光 我们来干一杯

translation.en: Absolutely.
-[Jimmy] Fifteen. -Here's to true love, guys.
Fifteen.
-True love. -Yeah.
Dinner was insane, but that's expected.
translation.zh: ‎出去吃晚饭真蠢 却又都想去

translation.en: But I'll tell you what, I want to record Holly chewing her ice cubes,
translation.zh:
‎不过你知道吗
‎我真想把霍莉嚼冰块的情景录下来

translation.en: use it as my alarm in the morning. That's--
translation.zh: ‎当成我早上起床的闹钟 真是…

translation.en: Guarantee me of wanting to wake up and leave.
translation.zh: ‎准会让我想跳起来跑着去上班

translation.en: What's the matter? You didn't like that joke?
I'm flossing.
[muffled] I can see that.
You're doing it extra hard tonight.
And I'm not sleeping with the fan on tonight. I hate that sound.
translation.zh:
‎今晚我不想开着风扇睡觉
‎我讨厌那个声音

translation.en: No fan necessary. We'll crank the AC, babe.
translation.zh: ‎不用风扇了 我们开空调吧 宝贝儿

translation.en: Uh-oh. What, what, what? You're gonna yell at me? I can see this. Hang on.
translation.zh:
‎怎么了？你要发飙了？
‎我看出来了 等一下

translation.en: Why don't you do some more angry flossing?
How come we haven't gone to Europe, Nick?
translation.zh: ‎为什么我们从没去过欧洲 尼克？

translation.en: You have to explain this to me.
We never go anywhere.
[stammers] We travel. I took you to the Poconos that time.
translation.zh:
‎我…我们旅游过啊
‎我那次还带你去过波科诺斯

translation.en: What? The Poco-- That was-- That was for a funeral, Nick.
translation.zh: ‎什么？波科…那次是去参加葬礼 尼克

translation.en: How about, uh, when we went to Virginia
translation.zh:
‎那我们去弗吉尼亚州
‎我叔叔在临终安养院

translation.en: when my uncle was in a hospice and we got to see him die?
translation.zh:
‎那我们去弗吉尼亚州
‎我叔叔在临终安养院 ‎我们去见他最后一面那次呢？

translation.en: -We did that. -Ugh, Nick. Come on.
I'm talking about the postcard.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 我说的是明信片的事

translation.en: -You don't remember that? -I remember it. Of course I remember it.
translation.zh:
‎-你都忘记了？
‎-我记得 我当然记得

translation.en: It's been 15 years, Nick. I don't know what we're waitin' for.
translation.zh:
‎都十五年了 尼克
‎我不知道有什么好等的

translation.en: [sighs] Now you've gone and done it, Audrey.
translation.zh: ‎你就非要现在闹吗 奥德丽

translation.en: What? What'd I do?
I told you I had something big for you at dinner,
translation.zh:
‎晚饭的时候我告诉你
‎给你准备了惊喜的

translation.en: and you couldn't wait till tomorrow morning?
No.
We're finally going to Europe. Happy anniversary.
translation.zh: ‎我们终于要去欧洲了 纪念日快乐

translation.en: Oh, my God. I have chills.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天哪 我都起鸡皮疙瘩了

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
Oh, my God! I'm so--
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天哪 ‎我真的…我破坏了你的惊喜

translation.en: -I ruined your surprise! -Shh. You didn't ruin anything.
translation.zh: ‎我真的…我破坏了你的惊喜 ‎你什么都没破坏

translation.en: You're the greatest. You deserve it. I love you.
translation.zh: ‎你最好了 怎么对你都不为过 我爱你

translation.en: -I love you! -It's still a surprise. I swear.
translation.zh:
‎-我爱你
‎-还会是个惊喜 我发誓

translation.en: -We can afford it, right? This is all-- -We can afford it, of course.
translation.zh:
‎-我们能负担得起 对吧？这一切…
‎-我们能负担得起 当然能

translation.en: -Okay. -I'm getting my raise this year.
translation.zh:
‎-那就好
‎-我今年就要涨工资了

translation.en: -Right. -We're all set. Come on.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-我们什么问题都没有 走吧

translation.en: -[Audrey] Hello. Hi. -Hello.
So, uh, we are on our honeymoon,
and I was wondering if we could possibly get an upgrade
because I have miles. Maybe--
I don't even know if it's from this airline, but do they expire, or--
translation.zh:
‎能吗？不知道是不是你们公司的
‎里程会过期吗 还是…

translation.en: Sir, you would have needed to request that in advance.
translation.zh: ‎先生 你要提前提出申请的

translation.en: -[Audrey] Yeah. -Right this way, please.
-Thank you. I'm so sorry. -We did try advance. I tried calling.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 对不起了
‎-好吧 我提前申请过 ‎-我打过电话 可是没人…
‎-你给谁打的电话？

translation.en: -And, um, nobody-- -Who'd you call?
translation.zh:
‎-我打过电话 可是没人…
‎-你给谁打的电话？

translation.en: -Crazy busy signals. -Really?
-It's the busy signals! -Who did you try to call?
translation.zh:
‎-一直都是忙线
‎-你给谁打的电话？

translation.en: I don't want to give it away. It was the butler.
translation.zh: ‎我不想剧透 是男管家巴特勒

translation.en: -The butler did it. -[sighs]
It's never the butler who did it.
I don't even think there are butlers.
translation.zh: ‎我都没想到还有什么男管家巴特勒

translation.en: That's just a word created for those goofy books you're addicted to.
translation.zh: ‎只是这些让你上瘾的书编出来的角色

translation.en: Would you just please, please shh?
Leave my books alone, okay? Just let me read.
translation.zh:
‎别评价我看什么 行吗？
‎让我安静看会儿书

translation.en: I just like-- Makes me happy.
Are you okay? You're cranky. Are you bored?
translation.zh:
‎你没事吧？
‎你今天有点怪 你很无聊吗？

translation.en: -I'm gonna go to sleep. -Take a nap.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-那我睡会儿 ‎-睡吧
‎-你不介意吧？

translation.en: -Are you okay with that? -Wait, don't--
translation.zh:
‎-睡吧
‎-你不介意吧？ ‎等等 别那样 座椅别往后放

translation.en: But just, please, don't-- don't lay all the way back.
translation.zh: ‎等等 别那样 座椅别往后放

translation.en: -Don't take it back? -No.
Why? You don't want my double chin to show?
translation.zh: ‎为什么？你不想看到我的双下巴？

translation.en: It's not your chins, okay. It's just rude.
translation.zh: ‎不是你的下巴 好吧 只是那样不礼貌

translation.en: Yes.
-Okay. 'Cause you splay out. -All right.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 因为你会七仰八叉的
‎-好吧

translation.en: And then your seat is in, like, the lap of the guy behind you.
translation.zh:
‎然后你的座位
‎就好像陷在后面那个人的怀里

translation.en: -So just be considerate of everybody. -I'll stay up. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-为大家考虑考虑
‎-那我就不放了 谢谢

translation.en: Timber.
[whispering] Oh, excuse me.
-Hi. -Hello. Hi.
Could I please have some earplugs?
Yes. For nine dollars.
Nine dollars? For earplugs?
Yes.
That's okay. I'll just-- I'll just use my peanuts.
I'll just--
Wow.
A fellow insomniac, I see.
translation.zh: ‎一个失眠的人 我看到了

translation.en: Jesus. Yes. I--
Yep. I know, right? I just cannot sleep on these things.
translation.zh:
‎是 我知道 行了吧？
‎在这上面我就是睡不着

translation.en: So what brings you across the pond?
Actually, it's my-- it's my honeymoon.
Oh. Congratulations.
-Thank you. -Where's your husband?
Dead.
Asleep. He's dead-- dead asleep.
translation.zh: ‎睡着了 很死 睡得很死

translation.en: We've actually been married for 15 years, but we just have been very, very, very, very busy.
translation.zh:
‎其实我们结婚都十五年了
‎可一直都忙得没有时间

translation.en: Then a toast to the whirlwind that is your life.
translation.zh: ‎那我们来为你生活的一片忙乱干杯

translation.en: Yes.
-Sorry, ma'am. -Oh, yes!
The bar is for first class passengers only.
translation.zh: ‎只有头等舱才能享受酒吧待遇

translation.en: Of course. Of course it is. I'm so sorry, yes.
I will head back to the lower class cabin
translation.zh: ‎对 我现在就回普通舱去

translation.en: and sit where I should and, uh... shovel some coal.
translation.zh: ‎坐我该坐的地方 再挖点煤去

translation.en: She's my guest.
Unfortunately, sir, she'd need her own first class ticket.
translation.zh:
‎很遗憾 先生
‎她要有自己的头等舱机票

translation.en: Charles Cavendish.
translation.zh:
‎-我需要…
‎-我是查尔斯卡文迪什

translation.en: I'm so sorry, sir.
Whoa!
Charles Cavendish?
Is that your real name?
[chuckles] I'm afraid so.
I mean, that sounds like it just fell right out of a... mystery novel.
translation.zh:
‎我是说
‎真像是我读的悬疑小说里的名字

translation.en: And which character would I be?
Name like that, you'd have to be the bad guy.
translation.zh: ‎你这样的名字 应该都是坏蛋

translation.en: Well... here's to the bad guys.
translation.zh: ‎哦 那我们就来敬这个坏蛋

translation.en: -Okay, so your fiancée... -Hm.
...leaves you...
[chuckles] ...for your elderly uncle--
Will you two kindly shut up?
translation.zh:
‎-这让你…
‎-能不能请你们两个闭嘴？

translation.en: Oh, be quiet.
Or we shall tell everyone about the ferret you've smuggled in here.
translation.zh:
‎或者要不要我们告诉大家
‎你带上来的雪貂

translation.en: -[giggling] -The whole thing is tawdry, I know.
translation.zh: ‎这么做太低俗了 我知道

translation.en: -[under breath] Tawdry. -He desired my betrothed,
translation.zh:
‎-低俗
‎-马尔科姆叔叔想要我的未婚妻

translation.en: and Uncle Malcolm always gets what he wants.
Malcolm. Uncle Malcolm.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆 马尔科姆叔叔

translation.en: -Quince. -Uncle--
Malcolm Quince is your uncle? That billionaire?
translation.zh:

Don't look at me like that. I can feel it.
translation.zh: ‎别那种眼神看我 我能感觉到的

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Excuse me. -Will you take the Allegra?
translation.zh: ‎对不起 ‎嘿 吃点非索非那定吧 一样的东西

translation.en: It's the same stuff.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 吃点非索非那定吧 一样的东西

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about it. -Oh, God.
[Audrey] Enter the brilliant yet tortured detective,
right on cue.
[man] Mesdames, messieurs.
My name is Inspector Laurent Delacroix.
translation.zh: ‎我是劳伦特德拉克洛瓦督察

translation.en: I will now summon you one by one to the grand lounge for questioning.
translation.zh:
‎我现在一个一个
‎叫你们到大休息厅里问话

translation.en: Why is that smoke ring so good? How did he do that?
translation.zh:
‎他吐的眼圈怎么那么好？
‎怎么弄的？

translation.en: Oh, you broke it. You broke it.
Tell me about Malcolm Quince.
He was the most wonderful--
Swine.
He was the love of my life.
He was a complicated man.
Describe to me what happened.
Yo, Mr. French Policeman, man. It was mad. Lights went out.
translation.zh:
‎哟 法国警察先生
‎我滴神哦 简直太疯狂了 ‎一下子灯都灭了

translation.en: [Colonel] I thought I saw something move, and I shot.
translation.zh: ‎我想我看到有什么在动 我就开枪了

translation.en: Yes. Finish line.
The old man got what was coming to him.
One-eight-seven, motherfu--
Did anyone touch the body?
No.
And did you notice anything else out of the ordinary?
-[all] The Americans. -Yes, number one. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-那两个美国人
‎-对 头号反常 没错

translation.en: [Audrey] Aren't you gonna, um...
Aren't you gonna separate us?
Pardon?
-For the interrogation. -[Nick] Okay.
Question us separately, see if our...
translation.zh:
‎-就是分开审问我们…
‎-你在干什么？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -...answers match.
translation.zh:
‎-…看我们的回答一不一样
‎-比如…

translation.en: What? I'm just saying, our answers will match
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-什么？我只是说 ‎我们的回答肯定一样
‎因为我们是无辜的

translation.en: -because we're innocent. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh:
‎我们的回答肯定一样
‎因为我们是无辜的 ‎对 没错

translation.en: There we go. God, you are really good at that. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-我们好了
‎-天哪 你真的很会吐圈圈

translation.en: We found this in Tobey Quince's suite.
translation.zh: ‎我们在托比肯斯的西装里发现了这个

translation.en: A typewritten suicide note
in which he confesses to the murder of his father.
translation.zh: ‎他在里面坦白了杀害他父亲的凶手

translation.en: Typewritten? -Mm-mm. -That's not very common.
-Very suspicious. -[Nick] Yes.
Yeah, obviously someone is trying to frame Tobey for his father's murder.
translation.zh:
‎是 显然是有人打印
‎陷害托比杀害了他父亲

translation.en: -[Audrey] This is amazing. -[Nick] Look how excited she is.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得真是太刺激了
‎-这让我很兴奋

translation.en: So where's your head at with this whole thing?
I mean, who are your chief suspects?
translation.zh: ‎我是说 谁是你们的头号嫌疑人？

translation.en: You.
-Woo, yes. -Right, of course,
-'cause everybody is a suspect. -Especially her. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-因为大家都有嫌疑
‎-尤其是她

translation.en: This is a group of friends and family who have known each other for years.
translation.zh: ‎他们都是多年的朋友和家人

translation.en: You two show up, and ten hours later, two of them are dead.
translation.zh:
‎你们两个才来了十小时
‎他们当中就死了两个

translation.en: Coincidence?
-Yes. -Absolutely.
-Coincidence. -Wait. Excuse me.
Are you saying that your theory
is that the two of us conned our way onto a stranger's boat at the last minute
translation.zh: ‎我们俩在最后时刻骗上了陌生人的船

translation.en: to commit premeditated murder that benefits us in no way?
translation.zh:
‎预谋策划了一起
‎对我们毫无益处的谋杀？

translation.en: That's your theory?
Perhaps someone paid you to do it.
-No. -Paid us to do it? [laughs]
Oh, my gosh. I would love to see that. Show me that money.
translation.zh:
‎哦 我的天哪 我还真想那样
‎那笔钱给我啊

translation.en: [Audrey] Do you want to see our bank statements?
translation.zh:
‎-是
‎-我们没有… ‎你想查查我们的银行对账单？
‎我们一穷二白

translation.en: [stammers] We're broke.
translation.zh:
‎你想查查我们的银行对账单？
‎我们一穷二白

translation.en: Desperate for money. I see.
Now you gave him a motive.
-No, no, no. I know. Just don't... -We did this because--
-...take my words out of context. -We got nothing.
translation.zh:
‎-你说我们一穷二白
‎-我的话被你断章取义了

translation.en: -That's all we got, is nothing. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-我们就是一无所有
‎-不 我…

translation.en: Listen, I am talking to you, detective to detective.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我和你谈谈 警探同行间的谈话

translation.en: We didn't do this.
-You can see in my eyes. You can tell. -Mm-mm.
Perhaps I will have that word with you independently.
I di-- Hey!
I can get up.
Hey, okay.
[Nick] I'll be out in a minute.
[Nick] I love you.
I'm sorry. She's just excited because it's-- -She reads books, and this is fun for her. -[door closes]
translation.zh:
‎对不起 她很激动
‎因为她看这类的书 她的爱好

translation.en: You wish me to believe you're innocent.
Unfortunately, I do not believe liars.
translation.zh: ‎遗憾的是 我不相信骗子

translation.en: But I'm telling you the truth.
And how long have you been lying to your wife?
Excuse me?
You did not think that we would investigate your background,
translation.zh: ‎你以为我们没有调查过你的背景？

translation.en: Sergeant Nicholas Spitz, NYPD?
Failed his detective's exam three times.
You are, how you do say, cop on the beat, not detective as you so claim.
translation.zh:
‎你是 你们叫什么来着 巡警
‎而不是你所说的警探

translation.en: So I... tell people I'm a detective.
There's-- That's not a crime.
Impersonating a detective is a crime.
I didn't think it was a crime here.
I thought maybe you guys had different rules.
translation.zh: ‎我想或许你们这里的法律不一样

translation.en: That doesn't make us murderers.
A broke, failed man, lying to his wife? I think it does.
translation.zh:
‎一贫如洗还对老婆撒谎的屌丝男？
‎我想有可能

translation.en: You don't have any evidence. You can't hold us.
translation.zh: ‎你没有证据 你不能扣押我们

translation.en: No, but I can hold these.
I believe Mr. Cavendish has provided accommodations for you
translation.zh: ‎我相信卡文迪什先生已经帮你们

translation.en: at the Hotel de Savoie, so you won't be on the street.
translation.zh: ‎在萨伏依酒店安排了住宿 ‎你们不用露宿街头了

translation.en: But mark my words, Officer Spitz,
translation.zh: ‎但你记住我的话 斯皮茨警官

translation.en: I will not rest until I prove that you committed these murders.
translation.zh: ‎不证明你就是凶手 我是不会罢休的

translation.en: And I...
translation.zh: ‎我罢休 因为我快累死了

translation.en: will rest, because I'm tired as shit, at that hotel you just said.
translation.zh: ‎我罢休 因为我快累死了 ‎你说的那家酒店

translation.en: It sounds like a good one.
But after I'm well-rested and I eat breakfast--
translation.zh: ‎但等我休息好了 我吃了早饭

translation.en: hopefully the guy cooks as good as Maurice--
translation.zh: ‎希望那里的饭和莫瑞斯做的一样可口

translation.en: I will not rest until I prove to you we have nothing to do with these murders.
translation.zh: ‎不证明我们无辜 我是不会罢休的

translation.en: [man] Juan Carlos!
[woman] Juan Carlos!
[Audrey] Charles said that everyone's gonna be at this race,
translation.zh: ‎查尔斯说大家都会来参加赛车比赛

translation.en: so whoever did this is gonna be there.
translation.zh:
‎-所以呢？
‎-所以凶手肯定也会来

translation.en: We have to figure out who it is.
I know we've gotta figure it out. This isn't one of your books, sweetheart.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 我们是得找出来
‎这不是你看的悬疑小说 亲爱的

translation.en: I mean, it's like one of your books, but this is real.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 很像你看的小说 但这是现实

translation.en: Like, two people are dead, for real.
-I know. -There's a real killer on the real loose.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道
‎-这是现实情节 真的凶手在逍遥法外

translation.en: Hey, babe. Relax. What's-- What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 宝贝儿 放松点 你怎么了？

translation.en: For real? Come on. Will you just focus...
translation.zh: ‎真的？我说 你就不能认真…

translation.en: -Fine. -...on this with me?
Um, yes. Uh...
[Nick] Okay. So there are three basic motives for every murder.
translation.zh: ‎每起谋杀都有三个基本动机

translation.en: [Audrey] Yes. The first one is money.
Right.
Everyone was in Quince's will, except Suzi.
translation.zh:
‎肯斯的遗嘱里每个人都有
‎就是没有苏子

translation.en: -Okay. -All right. The second one is love.
We know nobody loved that guy 'cause he was kind of a prick.
translation.zh:
‎我们知道没人爱那家伙
‎因为他很刻薄

translation.en: Suzi might have loved him.
-That's what you would think-- -Okay, what's the third one?
translation.zh:
‎-那是你的臆测 但我…
‎-第三个呢？

translation.en: -Revenge. -Right.
That's the one we should be thinking about.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该往这个方向考虑考虑

translation.en: I'm telling you, if we figure out who hates this guy the most,
translation.zh:
‎我告诉你
‎如果我们能找到最恨他的那个人

translation.en: that's our killer. Okay. Okay.
So, this beard... It's incredible.
Do you oil that or condition?
You won't get anything out of him.
Oh, my gosh.
Most of his life, he's been serving men like me and Malcolm,
translation.zh:
‎他大半辈子
‎都在为我和马尔科姆这样的人服务

translation.en: despite being an heir to millions.
translation.zh: ‎尽管他自己也是百万财富的继承人

translation.en: He's rich, too?
He's supposed to be, but he's one of 16 children,
translation.zh: ‎本来是 不过他是16个孩子之一

translation.en: and he's half French.
Are you familiar with French inheritance law?
Broad strokes.
That Colonel guy, he's getting on my nerves.
translation.zh: ‎上校那家伙 让我有点担心

translation.en: -Yeah. -Shit. Walking around
translation.zh:
‎-是嘛…
‎-该死 ‎他四处说是你杀了那两个人

translation.en: -saying you killed both those guys. -Huh?
translation.zh: ‎他四处说是你杀了那两个人

translation.en: -Yeah. -What?
And I'm like, come on.
translation.zh: ‎我就说 得了吧 我朋友不会做任何…

translation.en: -My man wouldn't do-- -Yo. Look, yo. I didn't do nothing, son.
translation.zh: ‎我就说 得了吧 我朋友不会做任何… ‎哟 听着 我什么都没干 孩子

translation.en: -It doesn't matter what the will says. -Uh-huh.
The fortune must be divided equally among the offspring.
Why do the French have such a law?
translation.zh: ‎为什么法国会有这样的法律？

translation.en: Well, they do it to keep all Frenchmen from doing what Malcolm was trying to do,
translation.zh:
‎呃 为了不让所有的法国人
‎都像马尔科姆那样

translation.en: and leaving everything to their mistresses.
translation.zh: ‎把所有财产留给他们的情妇

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh.
-My theory is... -Yeah?
...Juan Carlos done it, man.
What? Why would he do that?
Well, Juan Carlos's dad used to race for Malcolm.
translation.zh:
‎呃 胡安卡洛斯他爸
‎以前也给马尔科姆跑赛车

translation.en: Malcolm tried to get slick on some safety angle, and shit got overlooked.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆在安全角度上疏忽大意 ‎结果没人发现

translation.en: -Yeah? -Okay.
Juan Carlos's dad lost both his legs, G.
translation.zh: ‎胡安卡洛斯他爸就失去了双腿

translation.en: Yeah, straight up. [imitates bones snapping]
-Oh. -Gone.
So it's payback time. A hundred percent of a doubt.
translation.zh:
‎-所以到了报复的时间了
‎-百分百嫌疑

translation.en: Wh-What?
-Juan Carlos is your man. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-胡安卡洛斯就是你们要找的人
‎-哦 是嘛

translation.en: You guarantee that?
Guarantee.
Respect.
Or maybe Sergei could have done it.
-Yeah. -Okay. So you're not guaranteeing it.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-好吧 那你还是不确定

translation.en: No, not a hundred percent. No.
-[sneezes] -Oh! Bless you.
Would you like some Allegra?
-I doubt that would be useful. -I know.
It doesn't work. I tried to tell that to Nick.
translation.zh: ‎不管用 我一直都和尼克这么说

translation.en: Do you need something?
Uh, no. Mm-mm.
The guy that throws me off the most-- Cavendish--
translation.zh: ‎那个最想摆脱我的卡文迪什

translation.en: to me, he seems like he's compensating for something,
translation.zh:
‎我觉得他那种
‎《了不起的盖茨比》里的眼神和下巴

translation.en: with the Great Gatsby look and the jawline
and the "hey, I'm so gorgeous." Am I right?
translation.zh:
‎又好像在说 “嘿 看我这么帅”
‎我说得对吧？

translation.en: There's absolutely nothing wrong with Charles Cavendish.
translation.zh: ‎查尔斯卡文迪什绝对没问题

translation.en: -Isn't that the-- -Except...
he probably murdered his uncle.
Well, that's one thing wrong.
[commentator] ...comes to the checkered flag! It's Juan Carlos!
Winner of this year's Monte Carlo Grand Prix!
translation.zh: ‎他是今年摩纳哥大奖赛的冠军得主！

translation.en: [Audrey] I find that Suzi Nakamura very suspicious.
She's the only one who didn't have a motive.
translation.zh:
‎她是唯一一个
‎没有杀死马尔科姆动机的人

translation.en: -It was Cavendish and you know it. -You just-- No, you just don't like him.
translation.zh:
‎-是卡文迪什干的 你很清楚
‎-你不能…不 ‎-你只是不喜欢他而已
‎-我不喜欢他

translation.en: I don't like him. I don't. I hate his guts, but that's not it.
translation.zh:
‎-你只是不喜欢他而已
‎-我不喜欢他 ‎我讨厌他 但我就事论事

translation.en: -Did you just steal all of those? -He's the sole blood heir.
translation.zh:
‎-这是你偷来的？
‎-他是唯一全血脉继承人

translation.en: He stands to make the biggest claim for the fortune.
I want one of these.
-Malcolm stole his fiancée. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-马尔科姆抢走了他的未婚妻
‎-好吧

translation.en: That's all three motives. Money, love, revenge.
translation.zh: ‎三个动机都占全了 金钱 情爱 报复

translation.en: We went past it. I don't know where we are.
translation.zh: ‎走过了 不知道走到哪去了

translation.en: We're over here. Will you please try one of these?
No! Oh, my God. You know what?
translation.zh: ‎不要！哦 天哪 知道吗？

translation.en: I think you just think it's Cavendish 'cause you're jealous of him.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得你认为卡文迪什是凶手
‎是因为你嫉妒他

translation.en: -[scoffs] Oh, God. -Yeah.
-I'm jealous of him. -You are.
translation.zh:
‎-我嫉妒他？省省吧
‎-你是嫉妒他

translation.en: What? Why? What am I jealous of?
What is there to be jealous-- He's rich. He's charming.
translation.zh: ‎嫉妒什么 他有钱 他帅气

translation.en: He smells great.
What do you mean? What's he smell like?
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？他闻起来什么味道？

translation.en: He smells like he just came out of the dryer.
translation.zh: ‎他闻着就像刚从烘干机里出来

translation.en: What the-- What the--
[Audrey] No, no, no. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
We should test that for fingerprints first.
Okay. Do you have the fingerprint testing kit?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你拿验指纹的工具了？

translation.en: -What? -'Cause I didn't pack mine.
Is it in your bag?
Stop it! Come on.
Hurry.
Oh, this is so crazy.
Oh, God. Seriously?
translation.zh: ‎哦 天那 真那么难吗？

translation.en: Oh, got it.
Will you please just go see a chiropractor?
translation.zh: ‎你就不能去看看脊柱神经科？

translation.en: It's gonna be fine.
"Come to suite 802."
-We have to go to 802. -We're not going to 802. Stop!
translation.zh:
‎-我们要去802 快点
‎-我们不去802 得了吧

translation.en: -Why? -It's a trap.
Why wouldn't whoever just knocked just come in and talk to us?
translation.zh:
‎那家伙就不能
‎大大方方敲门进来说话？

translation.en: Maybe he's being watched by the killer.
What if we're being watched by the killer?
What if he was in here?
Maybe he stole my Peanut M&Ms.
translation.zh: ‎也许是他偷吃了我的花生巧克力豆

translation.en: I stole your Peanut M&Ms. You stole my Peanut M&Ms?
translation.zh:
‎-是我偷吃了你的花生巧克力豆
‎-你偷吃了我的花生巧克力豆？

translation.en: -I wanted to see if they tasted the same! -You got to stop eating.
translation.zh: ‎我想尝尝是不是在法国味道也一样

translation.en: You're gonna gain it all back.
translation.zh: ‎你不能再吃了 又会反弹的

translation.en: I'm going to 802. Are you coming with me?
Okay, wait. Let me just...
-What? -...figure something out.
God damn.
-What are you doing? -It's a weapon.
That's a lamp.
Not when I crack someone over the head with it.
translation.zh: ‎我用它砸谁的头的时候就不是灯了

translation.en: Will you stop questioning everything I do.
translation.zh: ‎你能不能不要我做什么你都问？

translation.en: Well, everything you do is questionable.
translation.zh: ‎那是因为你做什么都很有问题

translation.en: [whispering] That's 808.
Hello?
Note sender?
You told us to come to 802. Are you there?
Are you dead?
He might be in the bathroom.
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
[with deep voice] Sit on the bed.
You speak-- I thought you didn't speak.
Shut up. Sit on the bed.
-I'm sitting! -Shut up. Sit down.
translation.zh:
‎-我拉 我坐
‎-闭嘴 坐下

translation.en: We're gonna sit in front of the bed. All good.
translation.zh: ‎我们坐在床头 都坐好了

translation.en: I cannot keep his secrets anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我再也没办法替他保守秘密了

translation.en: You mean the Colonel's, right?
The Colonel's secrets? I know, it's so hard to keep secrets.
translation.zh:
‎上校的秘密？我知道
‎替人保守秘密是很难

translation.en: It really is. You know, I have a friend named Gwen,
translation.zh:
‎真的 ‎我有个朋友叫格温
‎她床底下有个盒子…

translation.en: and she has a box that she keeps under her bed--
translation.zh:
‎我有个朋友叫格温
‎她床底下有个盒子…

translation.en: Look, don't give me that hairdresser shit.
translation.zh: ‎听着 别给我扯发型师的那套废话

translation.en: Just shut up. Listen.
Copenhagen, 1994.
We were leaving a state dinner.
I did not see the bomber, but the Colonel did.
translation.zh: ‎我没看到轰炸机 上校看到了

translation.en: He threw his body across Mr. Quince.
translation.zh: ‎他扑到肯斯身上为他挡了子弹

translation.en: He was hero.
For nine months, the Colonel lay in a coma.
And when he awoke,
he find his eye is not the only thing he lost.
translation.zh: ‎他发现他不只失去了一只眼睛

translation.en: They blew off his dick. I knew it. I knew it.
translation.zh: ‎他的鸡巴也被炸飞了 我就知道

translation.en: -His hand. His hand, honey. -The dick. He's saying the dick.
translation.zh:
‎-手 他的手 亲爱的
‎-鸡巴 他说了是鸡巴

translation.en: -No, no, no. -He doesn't have a hand!
translation.zh:
‎-他没有手
‎-谁都有难过的时候…

translation.en: -I'm no talk about dick! -All right.
I talk about her.
-Me? -Her?
No, no, no.
Madeleine... LeBoutillier.
The most beautiful woman I have ever seen.
She was the Colonel's fiancée when the bomb exploded.
translation.zh: ‎爆炸之前她是上校的未婚妻

translation.en: And when he awoke...
she was Mr. Quince's wife.
What the hell is with this guy?
-What, honestly, is his problem? -Can he get his own woman maybe once?
translation.zh:
‎-他就不能有一次自己找一个？
‎-什么 老实说 他是不是有问题？

translation.en: And then she died.
-No! -[Nick groans]
In childbirth.
-No! -Damn.
The child died, too. A boy.
A boy who would have inherited it all.
translation.zh: ‎本来可以继承这一切的男孩

translation.en: After that, the Colonel never mentioned Madeleine again,
translation.zh: ‎从那以后 上校再也没提起过马德琳

translation.en: except for one night.
On the anniversary of her death,
he came to me, he was drinking. He say...

translation.en: make sure there are others with motive."

but can you say it from the top?

Say, "Siri, -I would like to make voice memo." -[overlapping chatter]
Get into wardrobe. You are in danger.

[Sergei] You. What do you want?

translation.en: -Now you like the lamp? You're ridiculous. -Well, we needed--

‎-不是 我们得有光…

Oh, thank God.
Killer... is...
[gasps] What?
[Audrey] Oh, God, no! No, no, no!
-[Nick groans] -Oh, my God!
Is he dead? Is he dead?
He's dead!
Do we call housekeeping?
-[pounding on door] -Oh! Honey! -[Nick] Oh, my God! -[screaming]

‎-哦！亲爱的 当心！

[Audrey] Oh, God! -[Nick yells] -Oh, my God.
Go! Out of the window!
-[thudding on door] -[Audrey] What are you doing?

‎-走 走窗户
‎-哦 天哪 ‎哦 老天爷 你要干什么？亲爱的

That's not a ledge, that's an edge!

translation.en: -[Nick] Here we go. -[Audrey] Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
‎-好了
‎-哦 我的天哪 ‎好了 我保护你

‎有我在 百分之百 慢点

‎-不 哦 天哪

-Don't look down. -Oh, my God!

‎-太远了

-[Nick] He flosses angrier than you! -[screaming]
[Nick] We got an empty room. Jackpot. -Okay, we're gonna get up on this letter. -Okay.

‎好了 我们进去

translation.en: Ready? Go. [straining]
Oh, my God!
-You okay? Come on. -That was the scariest thing.
translation.zh:
‎-你没事吧？起来
‎-这是最恐怖的事了

translation.en: -We gotta go. All right. I love you. -Oh, my God.

‎-哦 我的天哪

No, you're not going back out there.

Oh, kiss me. Kiss me here.

-God, I love it. Quick, get me to the bed. -Jesus Christ.

-Here we go! -Wow!

Okay, okay.

Jesus! Oh, my God.

Three!

-[gasps] -[yelling] [Audrey] No, no, no! Oh, my God! Go, go, go!

translation.en: Hey.
Hey! Come on!
Oh, shoot!
Hey!
Crazy... crazy... Crazy mad love!

‎-我不知道为什么总这样

-Huh? -Nick and Audrey Spitz.

‎-哦 天哪

translation.en: -[Audrey] Look at this place. -Let's go.
-[Audrey] Oh, my God. -This is big.
This is a big house. This is what they call rich people shit.
translation.zh:
‎这房子真大
‎这就是我们所说的富人宅第

translation.en: [Audrey] Lord Cavendish is expecting us.
Second floor, eighth door on the left.
Yes, that's right. That's what he told us, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对 他就是这么和我们说的

translation.en: Okay, so take a five-spotter.
translation.zh: ‎好 五欧元小意思拿着吧

translation.en: Your five euros is how much American-wise?
translation.zh: ‎你们五欧元换成美元是多少来着？

translation.en: Six American dollars.
Oh, that's, uh... that's more than I--
-Can I get a half a euro back-- -Oh, God. Please, Nick. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎能找给我半欧元吗？ ‎-照顾一下美国人
‎-拜托 谢谢

translation.en: I didn't know they were ahead of us with the money.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道他们的钱比我们的值钱

translation.en: -[Audrey] Second floor... -I got no bullets left,
so we'll bluff 'em until Interpol gets here.
translation.zh:
‎我没子弹了 只能吓唬吓唬
‎等着国际刑警来

translation.en: [Audrey] Honey, you just gotta be careful.
translation.zh: ‎好 亲爱的 你要小心点

translation.en: This guy has killed four people, that we know of.
translation.zh: ‎那家伙已经杀了四个我们认识的人了

translation.en: [Nick] Good news is, we know who did it.
-Okay. -Hard part is over with.
Okay.
And...
What's up, Dish?
Stay still! I'll shoot you right in the six-pack!
translation.zh: ‎不许动 否则我六颗子弹都喂给你

translation.en: -You hear me, bitch? -Calm down, babe.
translation.zh:
‎-听到了吗 混账？
‎-冷静点 宝贝儿

translation.en: Make a move! I dare you!
I dare-- Oh, my God!
-He's dead. -He's dead.
-Okay, he's dead. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 他死了
‎-哦 老天爷

translation.en: -What the hell? -Oh, God. Case reopened, babe.
translation.zh:
‎-见什么鬼？
‎-哦 天哪 案子并没结 宝贝儿

translation.en: They must have poisoned his drink!
-Nick! -And look at his face. It's--
I mean, besides the foaming mouth, he still kinda looks good.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 除了嘴角有泡沫 他还是很帅

translation.en: What is with this man?
We told the police. We called the police. We told 'em to come here.
translation.zh:
‎我们告诉警察了 我们叫了警察了 ‎-我们还让他们来这儿
‎-对啊

translation.en: -Yes. -We've got to stop them.
It's not like canceling a pizza, honey. You tell 'em to show up, they show up.
translation.zh:
‎这又不是点外卖 宝贝儿
‎你叫他们来他们就肯定会来

translation.en: If he's not the killer, who is the killer?
translation.zh: ‎如果他不是凶手 那凶手是谁？

translation.en: And if we don't know who the killer is before they get here, we're screwed!
translation.zh:
‎他们来之前我们还找不出凶手的话
‎我们就完蛋了

translation.en: Do you understand this? He's gotta be here in this house.
translation.zh: ‎你明白吗？他可能就在这个房间

translation.en: This is gorgeous wallpaper. Is that fabric? Is this embossed?
translation.zh: ‎这壁纸真好看 是壁布？还是雕饰？

translation.en: Sweetheart, you're losing it! You're making me nuts right now!
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 你别犯傻了
‎现在我也跟着你犯傻了

translation.en: No, I know. Hold on. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎不 我知道 等一下 好了

translation.en: All right, it's good. You all right? You breathing?
translation.zh: ‎好了 没事了 你好了？深呼吸？

translation.en: -I have to breathe through this. -Look at me.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 让我做个深呼吸
‎-看着我

translation.en: -We gotta turn ourselves in. -Wait, what?
translation.zh:
‎-我们得自首
‎-等等 你说什么？

translation.en: They're all gonna show up. If we run, they're gonna shoot us.
translation.zh:
‎他们都会来
‎我们要跑的话 他们就会开枪

translation.en: What do you mean? We're gonna just go to jail?
translation.zh: ‎你什么意思？我们要去坐牢了？

translation.en: It's better than getting shot, ain't it?
I don't feel-- I don't feel good.
-Babe. -Oh, God.
It's an Italian prison.
You know the food's gonna be incredible.
We'll have meatballs and pesto sauce and all that.
translation.zh: ‎我们还能吃到肉丸沙司什么的

translation.en: It's not co-ed, honey. All right?
translation.zh: ‎又不是男女同校机构 亲爱的

translation.en: We're-- We're not gonna be in jail together.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我们不能一起去坐牢

translation.en: I know.
Why did you lie to me?
'Cause I was... I was, uh... I was embarrassed.
With me?
Why? I--
I could've helped you figure that out. That's why we're together.
translation.zh:
‎为什么？我可以帮你的 ‎-所以我们才在一起
‎-我知道

translation.en: I know.
Remember when I couldn't pay my rent at the salon,
translation.zh: ‎记得我在发廊付不起租金的时候

translation.en: and then you were like, "Oh, okay." You got that boot off my landlord's car.
translation.zh: ‎你说“哦 好吧 我…” ‎你帮我从房东车上拿下了行李箱

translation.en: -That got me another week. -Yeah, I remember.
translation.zh:
‎又给我延一星期 ‎-对 我记得
‎-好

translation.en: Remember when your cholesterol was through the roof?
And then I made you eat egg whites? You hate egg whites.
translation.zh: ‎我让你吃蛋白的事吗？ ‎你讨厌蛋白 我逼你吃 还陪你一起吃

translation.en: And I made you do it, and I did it with you.
translation.zh: ‎你讨厌蛋白 我逼你吃 还陪你一起吃

translation.en: You helped me not miss yolks anymore.
That's right. That's what we do. We do things together.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我们就是这样 干什么都一起

translation.en: So can we please just figure this out, too?
translation.zh: ‎现在我们能不能也一起解决这件事？

translation.en: We just don't know who did it.
But Nick, we know who didn't do it.
translation.zh:
‎但是 尼克
‎我们知道谁不是凶手 对吧？

translation.en: -All right? -Right.
translation.zh:
‎但是 尼克
‎我们知道谁不是凶手 对吧？ ‎对

translation.en: So let's just go downstairs and act like we figured it out.
translation.zh:
‎那我们就下楼去
‎装作我们知道的样子

translation.en: If we're gonna do that, we gotta-- we just gotta look confident.
All right. If we're gonna look confident, we've gotta dress it.
translation.zh: ‎没错 要十分自信 我们就要穿戴自信

translation.en: I already know what I wanna wear.
What?
[Nick] What's up, fools?
Okay, we solved the case. Boom.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们破案了 耶

translation.en: Yo, yo! Where'd you get the clothes? It's a little much.
translation.zh: ‎哟 你们从哪弄的衣服？也太过了吧

translation.en: Um... I found this beautiful dress in a random closet.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我随便在一个衣橱里
‎找到了这条漂亮的裙子

translation.en: -You're looking gorgeous, by the way. -Thanks, baby.
translation.zh:
‎-你太美了 我不得不说
‎-还有…谢谢 宝贝儿

translation.en: -And he got this stunning tux... -Mm-hmm. ...off a...
Oh, why candy-coat it?
-A corpse. -Yeah.
There's another corpse?
Jeez! Sorry, yes. Upstairs, eighth door on the left.
translation.zh:
‎天哪 对不起 是的
‎楼上 左手第八扇门

translation.en: [Colonel] To whom does this dead corpse belong?
Oh, yeah. You guys don't know.
translation.zh: ‎哦 对 你们都不知道呢

translation.en: -Bad news, guys. -It's terrible. Cavendish is dead.
translation.zh:
‎-坏消息 伙计们 卡文迪什死了
‎-太糟糕了

translation.en: You stole the tux off Charlie's dead body?
translation.zh: ‎你从查尔斯的尸体上扒下来的衣服？

translation.en: And it fits perfectly. Little tight in the crotch, to be honest.
translation.zh: ‎很合身呢 说实话裤裆这里有点紧

translation.en: Just kidding. No, he's got me beat. He's got me beat.
translation.zh: ‎说笑的 不是的 他比我的大

translation.en: Wait. Where's Suzi?
-She's dead. -Dead.
-Oh! -Oh, my God!
Y'all are like the miniature Manson Family!
-No, no, no. -Nick and Audrey Spitz,
-you are under arrest. -[Audrey] Listen.
Ferme la bouche. Is that what it is?
-Just give us a second. We got this. -We got this. Let's go.
translation.zh:
‎-给我们点时间 我们来解释
‎-我们来解释 走

translation.en: [Nick] Thank you.
All right. Ladies and gentlemen, let's review the facts.
translation.zh: ‎好了 女士们先生们 我们来理一理

translation.en: [Nick] Malcolm Quince, he was the first to get murdered.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆肯斯 第一个死者

translation.en: We all assumed it was Tobey.
-No, we all assumed you did it. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎不 我们都以为是你们杀了他

translation.en: -Okay. -Yeah, but Tobey hated his father,
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-对 但是托比恨他父亲

translation.en: and he stood to inherit billions of dollars.
translation.zh: ‎而且他是亿万家财的继承人

translation.en: -Until he caught some lead to the dome. -Mm-hmm.
-Can you feel me, Raja? -Pew-pew-pew!
-There it is. -And then,
before Sergei was shot, he told us that the Colonel did it.
translation.zh:
‎谢尔盖被杀之前
‎他告诉我们是上校干的

translation.en: He told you what?
But we know you didn't do it, Colonel, because we saw you flossing your teeth
translation.zh:
‎但我们知道不是你 上校
‎因为我们看到案发当时你正在剔牙

translation.en: when we were shimmying by your window that night.
translation.zh: ‎我们那晚就在你窗外一摇一摆

translation.en: You two were spying on me in my bathroom?
translation.zh: ‎你们俩在我卫生间里监视我？

translation.en: Trust me, I did-- We saw a lot of shit that night that I did not want to see.
translation.zh:
‎相信我 我们那晚确实
‎见识了不少不想看见的龌龊事

translation.en: I mean, apologize ahead of time. We had to see you guys having sex.
translation.zh:
‎我是说 我要提前道歉
‎当时不得不看你们俩演鸳鸯戏

translation.en: You, um... You... saw that?
[Nick] Maharajah, some advice for you.
Maybe grab the bottom and squeeze.
translation.zh: ‎你或许可以抓住下面捏一捏

translation.en: Huh. Word.
Anyway...
French fries. Yes.
Actually, Juan Carlos, you had nothing to do with this.
translation.zh: ‎其实 胡安卡洛斯 你是无辜的

translation.en: You couldn't have had anything to do with it
because you were with us when Suzi got killed.
translation.zh: ‎因为苏子被杀的时候你和我们在一起

translation.en: -[Nick] So it wasn't you. -[Audrey] Mm-mm.
-It wasn't you. -Mm-mm.
-It wasn't you. -[Audrey] No.
It wasn't you.
Holy shit! Maybe we did do it.
translation.zh: ‎天老爷 或许真是我们干的

translation.en: -What? -Did you?
-Because listen-- -What did you just say to me?
translation.zh:
‎因为我当时…不
‎我不知道…我都乱套了

translation.en: -I'm just messing around. -There it is.
translation.zh:
‎因为我当时…不
‎我不知道…我都乱套了 ‎-这下好了
‎-他在鼓掌了

translation.en: -And he's clapping. -Going to jail. Thanks, babe.
translation.zh:
‎-这下好了
‎-他在鼓掌了 ‎去坐牢吧 真谢谢你了 宝贝儿

translation.en: I'm glad we finally are all on the same page.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴最终我们达成共识了

translation.en: Now, since the first murder occurred in French territorial waters,
translation.zh:
‎现在 由于第一起谋杀案
‎发生在法国领海

translation.en: I will be taking you to Paris to be arraigned and tried.
translation.zh: ‎所以我要带你们去巴黎审判

translation.en: At least we're going to Paris. You always wanted to go.
translation.zh:
‎至少能去巴黎了
‎你不是总想去巴黎嘛

translation.en: Honey, if you keep making jokes at a time like this,
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你这时候开玩笑

translation.en: it's not gonna make this go away.
translation.zh:
‎-也不可能这件事就过去了
‎-我不知道为什么…

translation.en: [clears throat] Lucky for you, since 1977,
translation.zh:
‎-也不可能这件事就过去了
‎-我不知道为什么… ‎你们很幸运 从1977年起

translation.en: there has been no death penalty under French law.
translation.zh: ‎法国法律就已经废除了死刑

translation.en: [whispers] French law. [whispers] French law.
The French law. Yeah.
Surely, Inspector, you of all people
translation.zh: ‎当然了 督察 还有你们所有人

translation.en: are familiar with the French inheritance law.
Are you implying I have bastard children?
Well, I wasn't.
Because I do. I was surprised you knew about them.
translation.zh: ‎我确实有 我很意外你们怎么知道

translation.en: I love those little bastards. [chuckles]
Okay. Anyway, um, the French law states that a man's estate
translation.zh: ‎好吧 总之 法国法律规定

translation.en: must be divided equally amongst his children.
translation.zh: ‎个人遗产必须平均分给子嗣

translation.en: So it wouldn't matter what the will said.
Straight up, Maharajah.
The kids were gonna get the money, whether the old man married Suzi or not.
translation.zh:
‎不管老头子和苏子结不结婚
‎钱都是孩子们的

translation.en: Mm-hmm. But both of Malcolm's children are dead.
translation.zh: ‎但是马尔科姆的两个孩子都死了

translation.en: -Both? -[Nick] Yes. Tobey,
translation.zh:
‎两个？ ‎对 托比 还有老头子
‎和马德琳勒巴特利雷的孩子

translation.en: and the son he had with Madeleine LeBoutillier..
translation.zh:
‎对 托比 还有老头子
‎和马德琳勒巴特利雷的孩子

translation.en: That boy died at childbirth.
Did he, Colonel?
I spoke to my partner in New York City.
translation.zh: ‎我和我纽约城的搭档联系过了

translation.en: I said, get the death certificates for Madeleine and the son.
translation.zh:
‎我说 给我查一下
‎马德琳和她儿子的死亡证明

translation.en: He could only find one for Madeleine.
translation.zh: ‎他只能找到马德琳一个人的

translation.en: But then I started thinking, maybe there's no death certificate
translation.zh: ‎然后我就想 或许没有死亡证明

translation.en: because there was no death.
Nonsense. Malcolm desperately wanted a boy to sire the next generation of Quinces.
translation.zh:
‎不可能 马尔科姆想要儿子
‎继承肯斯家族的财产都想疯了

translation.en: He would never abandon a son.
[stammering] But... what if it was a daughter?
-Yes! -What if it was a daughter?
The love of his life dies,
dies giving birth to his unwanted daughter.
translation.zh: ‎为了生下他不待见的女儿死了

translation.en: -Yes! -It almost makes sense.
-It does! It kinda does! -It makes total sense.
translation.zh:
‎-没错 说得通
‎-对 完全说得通

translation.en: He gave her away.
Then where is she now?
Well, she could be anywhere. She could have got married.
translation.zh: ‎她可能在任何地方 可能已经结婚

translation.en: She could've joined a gang, changed her name. Who knows? Carry on.
translation.zh:
‎可能加入了黑帮 可能改名换姓了 ‎-谁知道呢？继续说
‎-改名换姓

translation.en: -Changed her name. -Ah!
-You changed your name. -[Nick] Yes.
Your real last name isn't Ballard.
So? Lots of artists change their names.
translation.zh: ‎那又怎么了？很多艺人都会改名字

translation.en: Lady Gaga's real name isn't Lady Gaga.
Yes, Lady Gaga. "Paparazzi," yes, good.
translation.zh: ‎哦 对 Lady Gaga 《狗仔队》 没错

translation.en: But every Grace Ballard superfan knows your first movie was Summer Wetdown.
translation.zh:
‎但是每个格蕾丝巴拉德的铁杆粉丝
‎都知道你电影处女作是《夏季潮湿》

translation.en: You had three lines, and you went by your birth name,
translation.zh: ‎你在里面有三句台词 用的是原名

translation.en: Grace Butler.
Which, en français, roughly translates to LeBoutillier.
translation.zh: ‎法语里 大概翻译就是勒巴特利雷

translation.en: Madeleine LeBoutillier, your mother.
translation.zh: ‎马德琳勒巴特利雷 是你妈妈

translation.en: This is a joke.
I wasn't even in the room when Malcolm Quince was murdered.
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆肯斯被杀的时候
‎我根本就不在房间

translation.en: Fine! Then Tobey killed him, but he did it with a little help.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那就是托比 但得有人帮他

translation.en: [Audrey] The lights. You turned out the lights.
[Nick] You convinced Tobey to kill Malcolm so you could split the money with him.
translation.zh:
‎你说服托比杀了马尔科姆
‎然后你和他平分家产

translation.en: [Audrey] And then you killed Tobey so that you could just keep all of it.
translation.zh:
‎然后你杀了托比
‎这样你就可以独吞了

translation.en: Then me and this girl started asking too many questions.
translation.zh: ‎然后我和这位女士开始不断质疑

translation.en: So you had to get rid of us.
[Nick] Luckily, not for him, but Sergei gets in the way.
translation.zh: ‎幸运的是 谢尔盖给我们当了挡箭牌

translation.en: [Audrey] Then you seduce the Maharajah
so that you would make us think you were with him all night.
translation.zh: ‎好让我们相信你整晚都和他在一起

translation.en: Yo, you were just twizzlin' on my wizzle for an alibi.
translation.zh:
‎哟 原来你在我身上揉来揉去
‎是想制造不在场证据

translation.en: Girl, that's cold.
You tried to kill us in the library.
[Nick] You tried to kill us in the market, but you got Suzi instead.
translation.zh: ‎想在市场杀了我们 却误杀了苏子

translation.en: -And the weapon... -Hm! -I recognize the weapon now. -[Audrey] The dart?
translation.zh: ‎还有武器 我现在认出那个武器了

translation.en: It was a movie. I watched it one night. You were out with your friends.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 是镖
‎-电影里用过 我有天晚上看过 ‎你和你朋友们出去了

translation.en: You came back drunk and, uh... What the hell was it?
translation.zh: ‎喝醉了才回来 叫什么名字来着？

translation.en: Princess Blow Dart.
[Audrey] Oh, God.
That is not the name of a movie.
It is! It is!
Yo, look at my screensaver.
-[Vik] That's her! -[Audrey] Oh, my gosh!
So then you killed Charles
because you knew he would never rest until he found out who Suzi's killer was.
translation.zh:
‎因为你知道 ‎他不查出杀害苏子的凶手
‎是不会罢休的

translation.en: [Nick] 'Cause he loved Suzi, not you!
translation.zh: ‎因为他爱的是苏子 不是你

translation.en: The three motives: money, love, revenge.
translation.zh: ‎三种动机：金钱 情爱 报复

translation.en: You were the mastermind
behind Malcolm Quince's murders, weren't you?
translation.zh: ‎谋杀案的幕后元凶 是吧？

translation.en: -And you were the one who framed us. -You killed them all, didn't you?
translation.zh:
‎-也是你陷害的我们
‎-他们都是你杀的 对吧？

translation.en: [Nick] Didn't you?
My father was a monster.
So you admit it?
Yes.
I am the daughter of Malcolm Quince and Madeleine LeBoutillier,
translation.zh:
‎我是马尔科姆肯斯
‎和马德琳勒巴特利雷的女儿

translation.en: and sole heir to the Quince fortune.
translation.zh: ‎也是肯斯家族遗产的唯一继承人

translation.en: Uh, and... what about the murders?
Oh, I didn't do those.
But it couldn't have happened to a nicer group of people.
translation.zh:
‎但如果大家都是好人
‎也不至于到现在这步田地

translation.en: [Delacroix] So... what other proof do you have?
-Of what? -Proof of what?
That she killed everybody?
Yes.
Aren't you gonna do anything at all?
I mean, is there a French holiday we're unaware of?
translation.zh:
‎是在过什么
‎我们不知道的法国假日吗？

translation.en: What the hell do you do?
Look... I don't know how you do things in Brooklyn,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我不知道你们布鲁克林怎么做

translation.en: but here we need evidence to make an arrest.
translation.zh: ‎但我们这里要逮捕是需要证据的

translation.en: This is not how this is supposed to happen.
The detective is supposed to explain the murders, which we just did,
translation.zh:
‎警探就是要还原案情
‎就像我们刚才那样

translation.en: and then the killer is supposed to crack and freak out under pressure and admit it!
If there's nothing else, I'd like to start spending my money now.
translation.zh:
‎如果再没什么事了
‎我现在就要开始去花我的钱了

translation.en: The hat. The hat! Uh, take off your hat.
What?
I said take off your hat.
No.
The Maharajah bought me this hat, and I quite like it.
translation.zh: ‎大王给我买的帽子 我很喜欢

translation.en: Nick hit the killer in the head with a plate.
translation.zh: ‎尼克用盘子打中了凶手的头

translation.en: And it left a mark, didn't it?
Also, why on earth would you put a hat on a freshly styled head of hair?
translation.zh:
‎还有 你新做的头发
‎为什么要戴顶帽子？

translation.en: How would you know my hair's been freshly styled?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道我头发是新做的？

translation.en: 'Cause she's a goddamn hairdresser.
Please remove your hat, Ms. Butler.
translation.zh: ‎请你摘下帽子 巴特勒小姐

translation.en: I'll do nothing of the kind.
The butler did it. Grace Butler did it! Grace But-- Right?
translation.zh:
‎管家巴特勒干的
‎是格蕾丝巴特勒 格蕾丝巴…对吧？

translation.en: -I said it on the plane. -You had to do it!
-[Grace] Stay back! -Jesus!
Everybody!
-Oh, my God! -Son of a bitch.
-Wait! No, no. -Whoa!
Nobody move! Nobody move, or I'll shoot her.
Guns down. Baissez vos armes.
[Delacroix] Get an ambulance.
Yo, I thought you said he was a terrible shot.
translation.zh: ‎哟 我还以为你枪法很烂呢

translation.en: Not when it comes to saving my woman.
translation.zh: ‎烂也不能在救我老婆的时候烂

translation.en: -I was aiming for her foot, by the way. -[gasps]
translation.zh: ‎我瞄准的是她的脚 顺便说一句

translation.en: All right. It's all right.
Thank you for stepping in and trying to stop her, Juan Carlos.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你当时帮忙阻止她 胡安卡洛斯

translation.en: That was so brave.
I love that. I love that he's brave and I'm, what, nothing?
translation.zh: ‎他勇敢 那我呢 就没什么了？

translation.en: -Are you kidding? I said you were brave. -You didn't say it.
translation.zh:
‎-你开玩笑吗？我说了你很勇敢的
‎-你没说过

translation.en: I said so many times. "Nick, you were so brave."
translation.zh: ‎我说过很多次“尼克 你真勇敢”

translation.en: [imitating Juan Carlos] De nada, señora. Halloween.
Yo, I got a question.
In the hotel in Monte Carlo, you said that you saw me and Grace together.
translation.zh:
‎蒙特卡洛酒店的时候
‎你们说看到我和格蕾丝一起了

translation.en: -We heard you. -We heard you.
translation.zh:
‎-我们都听到了
‎-我们都听到了

translation.en: We didn't like what we heard, but I'll tell--
translation.zh: ‎我们不想听的 可我和你说…

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -I hope those are new pants, by the way.
translation.zh:
‎-对不起
‎-我希望你这是条新裤子 顺便说一句

translation.en: -[laughing] -Yeah, but... But the truth is,
Grace and I were together in the bar an hour before we got to our room,
translation.zh:
‎格蕾丝和我
‎在回房间前一小时都在酒吧里

translation.en: so how could she have killed Sergei if she was with me?
translation.zh:
‎她和我在一起
‎又怎么去杀的谢尔盖？

translation.en: Nick.
Audrey.
How did Juan Carlos understand my English just now?
translation.zh:
‎胡安卡洛斯
‎刚才怎么能听懂我的英语？

translation.en: [Delacroix] Stop!
No! No!
[Juan] Don't come any closer!
Aah! He speaks English!
I've spoken English my whole life, you idiots,
translation.zh:
‎我一辈子都会说英语
‎你们这帮蠢货

translation.en: and a dozen other languages.
And by the way, your Latin sucks.
translation.zh: ‎顺便提一句 你的拉丁语太烂了

translation.en: You understood it!
Don't you even think about it, Colonel, or I will shoot your dick off.
translation.zh:
‎想都别想了 上校
‎否则我开枪打掉你的鸡巴

translation.en: Put your hands up in the air, now.
I am the one who told her to convince Tobey to kill his dad,
translation.zh: ‎是我让她说服托比去杀了他爸爸

translation.en: destroy this sick family in the name of my father.
translation.zh: ‎以我父亲的名义毁了这个变态的家族

translation.en: Get into the car.
-[policemen yell in Italian] -[Juan] Back off!
I go fast.
[Nick] Hey!
[Nick] Look at that! A Ferrari!
-What? -Testarossa!
Magnum P.I.! Me, baby! I got the mustache!
translation.zh:
‎《夏威夷神探》！我 宝贝儿！
‎我有胡子！

translation.en: [Nick] This is incredible! This is a fantasy for everybody!
translation.zh: ‎太不可思议了 这是每个人的梦想

translation.en: [Audrey] How does it open?
[Nick] Underneath! Pull! Pull! Come on!
Oh, my God.
What the--
-Are you kidding me? -I'm so sorry! I don't know what to say!
translation.zh:
‎-你开什么玩笑？
‎-对不起 我不知道该说什么

translation.en: Go, go, go!
-Put your hands up. Hands up! -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
[Nick] All I'm saying is,
when the engine sounds like your sister's voice--
irritating, high, and loud-- you gotta switch gears.
translation.zh: ‎又尖又亮又刺耳的时候 就该换挡了

translation.en: [Nick] Yes!
Look how nice you handle this thing!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
-Honey, he's right up there. -I see him.
translation.zh:
‎-亲爱的 他就在前面
‎-我看到了

translation.en: Again!
Yeah! Baby, nice. Nice! Nice turn!
[Nick] Look at you! Look at you!
Keep going. Keep after him. Keep after him. Keep going.
-Goat! Goat! Goat! -[yells]
Holy cow!
Do you have any idea how gorgeous you look?
Wait! Second goat! What the hell?
translation.zh: ‎等等 又一只山羊！怎么回事？

translation.en: -Do you not like goats or something? -I love them!
translation.zh:
‎-你和山羊有仇还是怎么的？
‎-我喜欢山羊

translation.en: Idiots.
Oh, shit.
Keep going, baby. Go! Go! Go!
Go! Go! Go!
-Holy shit! -Oh, God!
-We gotta pit him, honey. -I gotta what him?
translation.zh:
‎-我们闹他 亲爱的
‎-我怎么他？

translation.en: What you do is you hit the back bumper and he'll just spin out.
translation.zh:
‎你只要从后面撞他的保险杠
‎他的车身就会倒转

translation.en: -I can't do that. I can't-- -You got this.
I can't. He's a Formula 1 race car driver!
translation.zh: ‎我不行 他是一级方程式赛车手

translation.en: Faster! Come on!
-[Audrey whimpers] -This is our adventure.
Go for it.
I can do this. I love you. That was sweet.
translation.zh: ‎我能行的 我爱你 你真好

translation.en: Okay, here we go.
No!
He didn't spin. He didn't spin. We just gotta take him out.
translation.zh: ‎他没倒转 我们还要再来

translation.en: -Take him out! -Here we go.
translation.zh:
‎他没倒转 我们还要再来 ‎-好吧
‎-铲他！

translation.en: Floor it! Floor it!
What?
Hit the brakes! Hit the brakes! Hit the brakes!
Do you have any idea how cool you are?
-Happy anniversary, baby! -Yeah.
Oh, my God.
-Okay. -Okay.
-I'm gonna go get that guy out of the car. -Go get him.
[both] I love you.
-I love you. -Oh, my God.
Let's go. Let's go.
I got you. Come on.
-All right. -[Delacroix groans]
[Juan] I'm so sick of you, cop!
You should have never come here!
You should have just stayed home, eating hot dogs,
reading People magazine, and watching reality TV.
translation.zh: ‎读读《人物杂志》 看看真人秀节目

translation.en: [Audrey] Baby.
You know, that was our-- That was our tour bus!
translation.zh: ‎知道吗 那是我们的旅游巴士

translation.en: [woman] No toilets, no Wi-Fi, and you're running over people?
translation.zh: ‎没有厕所 没有无线网 现在还撞人？

translation.en: -Brittany's hogging the window seat! -I want to see the dead guy!
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸 布列尼塔总霸着靠窗的座位！
‎-我想看那个死人！

translation.en: Just sit down and shut up! I'm gonna take a picture!
-All right. I love you. -Oh, my God, this guy--
translation.zh:
‎-没事了 我爱你
‎-为什么你没尽力救他？

translation.en: -We gotta ask 'em how they age ham. -I don't care!
translation.zh:
‎不过我们还得问问他们
‎火腿是怎么风干的

translation.en: [Nick] Come on!
[Delacroix] On behalf of Interpol, I thank you, Mrs. Spitz.
translation.zh:
‎我代表国际刑警组织感谢你
‎斯皮茨太太

translation.en: You are as brilliant as you are beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎你很优秀 就像你的长相一样迷人

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, my gosh. Well, thank you for that.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 我的天哪 谢谢夸奖
‎-她很无畏 是

translation.en: -[Delacroix] And Officer Spitz. -[Nick] I go, what? What?
translation.zh:
‎-还有斯皮茨警官
‎-我呢 怎么样？

translation.en: It seems you are quite the detective after all.
-[Audrey] You are! -With this girl, yes.
Something I will be passing along to your superiors in New York.
That would be big.
I have to tell you, I think this entire experience was pretty great.
translation.zh: ‎我要说 这次经历真的很精彩

translation.en: -Incredible. -Yeah.
Outside of the murders, it was on the money.
translation.zh: ‎除了谋杀案 一切都恰到好处

translation.en: Well, I hope the rest of your trip, which we have arranged for you,
translation.zh: ‎哦 希望你们余下的旅程能轻松点

translation.en: is more relaxing.
-Bon voyage. -Well, thank you.
You owe that to us, but thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎你们应该给的 不过还是十分感谢

translation.en: You ever come to New York, you look us up.
translation.zh: ‎去纽约的时候一定去看我们哦

translation.en: We'll pin, uh, a triple homicide on you or a kidnapping or something.
translation.zh:
‎我们给你定三个杀人罪
‎或者绑架罪什么的

translation.en: -Thank you. Okay. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh:
‎-他开玩笑的
‎-好的 ‎-谢谢
‎-认识你很高兴

translation.en: Good to meet you. All right. Be safe.
-Good anniversary, right? -Amazing anniversary.
translation.zh:
‎-纪念日过得不错 是吧？
‎-太棒了

translation.en: -Kind of-- Kind of a cool one. -Loved it!
What did you get me, by the way, for a present?
translation.zh:
‎你给我准备什么礼物了
‎顺便问一句？

translation.en: What? Oh, uh...
I got you the Amazon gift card.
translation.zh: ‎我给你准备了亚马逊礼物卡

translation.en: -You did? -No, I didn't get you anything.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-没有 我什么都没给你准备

translation.en: ♪ See what happiness has done ♪
